description: Commute benefit used -- Discounted (partially subsidized) transit passes or fares

description: Commute benefit used -- Free (fully subsidized) parking at work

description: Commute benefit used -- Discounted (partially subsidized) parking at work

description: Commute benefit used -- Compressed work week (e.g., four 10-hour days, 9 days/80 hours)
logic: if commute_subsidy NOT "don't know" or "none of the above" (commute_subsidy_996 and commute_subsidy_998 = "not selected") and commute_subsidy = "compressed work week (e.g., four 10-hour days, 9 days/80 hours)" (commute_subsidy_5 = "selected")

description: Commute benefit used -- Flextime (can adjust schedule as long as work the right number of total hours)

description: Commute benefit used -- Ability to work from home
